text:
Despite criticisms, the Bilderberg Group has had a significant impact on

international relations and policy-making. The group's discussions have

influenced various areas, including economic cooperation (e.g., the creation of

the European Union), security policies (e.g., NATO's expansion into Eastern

Europe), and global governance (e.g., the establishment of the G20 summit)

(url website). The group continues to convene annually, with its meetings often

attracting significant media attention.
